subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In 2007 the Yankees scored 968 runs, the most for the team in 70 years. A year later, however, the Yankees’ offense has turned from an asset into a major problem.
snippet: In 2007 the Yankees scored 968 runs, the most for the team in 70 years. A year later, however, the Yankees’ offense has turned from an asset into a major problem.
